comprehensive_overview: The Intel Compiler Runtime Library (Intel Compiler RT) is a collection of runtime libraries for the Intel software development tools, designed to provide support for various runtime components in software applications compiled with Intel compilers.
core_features:
1. Provides runtime support for applications compiled with Intel compilers
2. Includes optimized libraries for performance-critical functions
3. Supports advanced processor optimizations
4. Enhances application performance and reliability
5. Enables better scalability and parallelism
